landing_main1: The PoëzijLab project brings together the finest Friesian poetry of the first 20 years of this century. Handpicked by experts and each painstakingly translated into Dutch to preserve the atmosphere, meaning and 'Friesianness' of the original work. The extended commentaries accompanying each work provide additional fascinating insight, giving interesting background and delving into the poet's mind. Why did they use those particular words? What techniques are they using to create atmosphere and momentum? All in a down-to-earth, engaging style that avid poetry fans and newcomers to the genre will enjoy.
landing_main2: But PoëzijLab is much more than a collection of poems. Anyone interested in the art of poetry is encouraged to sample the workshops and masterclasses, and try their own hand at writing a great work for the next generation. Whether in Friesian or Dutch. All notes, commentaries, workshops and masterclasses are in both languages, giving wider access to the whole poetry scene not just in Friesland but in the Netherlands as a whole.
landing_main3: Above all, PoëzijLab aims to make poetry fun and a delightful voyage of discovery for all.
landing_main4: The poetry collection and participation in PoëzijLab is open to everyone, free of charge.
landing_snippet1: Write your own epic with our guides, hands-on workshops and masterclass
landing_snippet2: Check out the latest in the Friesian poetry scene
landing_snippet3: 100 works from the best of the best Friesian poets
landing_snippet4: Fully bilingual - Dutch translation of all poems, notes, commentaries and masterclasses
landing_snippet5: All works with copious notes and insightful commentaries
landing_snippet6: The latest - the first 20 years of the 21st century distilled into one collection
landing_snippet7: Painstakingly selected by renowned Friesian poets
landing_snippet9: Get much more from each poem with the detailed commentaries on each work
landing_snippet10: Explore the works by genre, subject, author and much more
